Proteins

# Structures

You can load a Protein Structure from the PDB (Protein Data Bank):

@example proteins pstruc1 = viewstruc("2VB1")


# Multiple sequence alignments

You can similarly load a Multiple Sequence Alignment from the Pfam database:

@example proteins msa1 = viewmsa("PF00062")

An MSAView contains the most relevant information about the protein sequences in the alignment along with the Scene and Layout which comprise the interface.
